pageContext.claim: “After the signing of this proclamation, Century Aluminum in Kentucky -- Century's a great company -- will be investing over $100 million to restart and upgrade their idled military-grade, high-quality aluminum production, which is also critically important to our national security.”
pageContext.analysis: Century did announce that it would rehire 300 workers after a $100 million investment. But economists said that overall, Trump's tariffs could cost 100,000 to 150,000 jobs in other industries because of the tariffs.
